extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  Level 2 or above or 6.0 units at the 100 level in RELS

basic.description: An introduction to the self-definition of Judaism through an analysis of the concepts of God, Torah and Israel past and present. Also, a preliminary study of the struggles facing Jews in Europe, the State of Israel and North America.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Judaism
